Text: Referred by Mark Kierlanczykpst Vince I am an exEnron that was part of the cost cutting measures implemented in early December One of the people I have spoken during my job search is Mark Kierlanczyk from AON Mark suggested you might be someone I could contact and talk to briefly about my job search In general terms I am looking for a job in finance or structuring with an international company My ideal job would be one that involved a mix of finance and origination for an international energy or petroleum company however I am very flexible Obviously the market is not real strong right now especially in Houston but I was hoping to ask you if you have some ideas of how I might best proceed I am sure you are quite busy but I would welcome a moment to talk to when you have a couple of minutes I have enclosed a copy of my resume just to let you know where I have been Many thanks Edmund Gaither EDMUNDGAITHERresumedoc
